title: StructFilteringName (Struct)
text:
TYPE StructFilteringName : STRUCT
This structure is used to pass the name of remote device and the name of âalarm group/alarm classâ to filter on.

rows.Name: sRemoteDevice
rows.Comment:
The name of the remote device where the group/class belongs to.
It must be empty in case of local group/class

rows.Name: sName
rows.Comment: The name of group/class to filter
